name: Steam Spree
description:
A game about a robot controlled by a crazy wizard that wants to loot areas but without fighting.

At first the robot only has a torch as a weapon (so you can't switch weapons with low score)

After you have increased the score as much as you can, then you have to come back to the entrance of the level and go through the darkness. Then, the wizard WILL RATE YOUR SCORE.

(Have in mind that the submitted version for the game jam is the game.rar file, not the .zip nor the browser version)

Controls:

WASD: Move

Jump : Spacebar

MouseWheel: Change Weapon

Left Mouse Click: Attack

Credits:

Art made by Flip 

Music made by HexStar27

Code by Glaucus Atlanticus & HexStar27
